Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Come here if you want food with a burst of flavour. Everything we tried was very tasty a mix of med and north african cuisine. Must try the chickpeas !

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Jan Pieter Heije’s O.G. Way before it was hip there. And going steady. One of Amsterdam’s best Deli’s. Cosy staff. Quality food. Evergreen.  Their tiramisu is without doubt the best in town. Italian’s don’t make this one better.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Restaurant prices for buffet food. €13 for a lamb skewer and broccoli. When asking about the portion sizes I was told to buy more because I didn’t seem convinced. There’s better places on the same street to buy good food with the right portions at the same price.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: One of the best food I've eaten in Amsterdam. It is not cheap but worth it. The owner was extremely nice. The atmosphere is really cute and homy. I definitely recommend it.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: This is a little gem to have a casual lunch, dinner and take away! A traiteur with dining possibilities as if you sit at mother kitchen table and food is cooked for you whilst you wait. Lovely!

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: A homely feel to the place where you can see the chefs prepare the food on this long marble table. With soothing Mediterranean colours and jazz music playing in the background. …

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Such a great place! The food is so delicious, the staff are very friendly and helpful! They have great vegan options:) highly recommended!

Name: Saffraan
Review Text:
Incredible homemade brownie!!
This being said, all what we tried was tasty and nice for a fairly good price. Friendly staff and they have a few seats inside if you don't want to take away …

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Very good food and the staff is super friendly! I love coming here. :)

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: We had several dishes and it was all very delicious. We especially love the spinach chickpea curry and all the ingredients tasted really fresh. The staff was very warm too.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: This place is more like a take-away food for after work. However they offer few small tables if you wan to sit down. They offer fresh cooked food, in a homemade style. There are choices for pasta, salad, meat, fish, etc. It's a bit pricey for take-away but always of top quality.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: I loved the food !! Amaizing cozy friendly ! Healthy food coocked with love.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: 10 euros for a small plate of pasta with unwashed sandy spinach, overheated in microwave was a waste of money. Unkind service.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: great catering for a solid, quick dinner. A bit expensive

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Great food, nice service, cozy atmosphere.

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: Food is very average, extremely expensive for super small portions and the staff doesn't care when you share your honest opinion. Don't go here!

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: SO OVERPRICED!!!!!15€ for a "menu" that's not even a side dish!

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: It was an incredible surprise to find this place. The food, prices and service is simple and nice. Real homemade food! Highly Recommended!

Name: Saffraan

Name: Saffraan
Review Text: When I walk in it feels like made from the heart, the taste is delicious and the staff is warm and welcoming. I highly recommend this perl!
